title: Merck Covid-19 Pill Cleared for Use in U.K.
sub_head: U.S. is also expected to authorize molnupiravir, which has been found to reduce the risk of hospitalization, in coming months
body:
Merck & Co. said U.K. health regulators cleared a Covid-19 drug it developed with partner Ridgeback Biotherapeutics LP, the first country to authorize the pill that can be taken at home and promises to keep people out of the hospital.
The Merck-Ridgeback drug will give the U.K. a much-needed weapon against Covid-19 as winter approaches.
